text:
ASL19 | Toronto (Onsite)

We are a research and development lab building technology for social good. Ranging from access to information solutions for bypassing Internet censorship to government transparency and accountability projects.

- Android Developer (https://goo.gl/PZixm6)

- Backend Dev (https://goo.gl/FZYGIH)

- Security Researcher/Malware Analyst (https://goo.gl/cnSlfi)

We Offer:

- Competitive salary and benefits.

- All the hardware you need for your coding.

- Catered lunch and healthy snacks.

- An open culture that welcomes ideas and independence and values dedication.

Email us your resume and a cover letter to: apply at asl19.org
